welcome_message_body: Welcome to Medina Estates, Ghana! Known for its rich history, vibrant culture, and welcoming people, we invite you to explore the city and immerse yourself in its charm. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Peterpan Madina
restaurants.description: Peterpan Madina is a burger joint located in Accra.

restaurants.name: Papa's Pizza
restaurants.description: Papa's Pizza is a pizzeria located in Accra.

restaurants.name: Barita's
restaurants.description: Barita's is a diner located in Accra.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kotoka Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal dedicated to international flights, with modern facilities and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Kotoka Airport, exclusively for international flights and equipped with state-of-the-art technology.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited bandwidth and speed.
